question: Pennie Account Creation
text:
Pennie Account Creation
          
        
At Pennie, the security and privacy of our customersand our partners who work with us to connect Pennsylvanians to coverage, is paramount. That is why
all
producers working in the Pennie platform
must create their own unique Pennie account.
If you are a part of an agency without an agency account (including producerswithin their own agency), then you will need todo the following to get certified through Pennie and create your Pennie account:

Have a valid PA Health Producer Licenseand National Producer Number
Complete Pennie Training
Allow Pennie 5-7 business days to complete your certification.
NOTE:If you are in an agency with multiple producers and not sure of who should be the agency manager, pleasedontregister your agency without checking with your agency who should have this role.
If your agency has an agency account already setup but no agency manager identified, then you will need to:

Identify who should be the agency manager.
Have your designated agency manager contact thededicatedPennie producercall centerat 844-844-4440.
Ask the call center representative to have that producersaccount changed to an agency manager.
Have the designated agency manager add new agent from within their account.
NOTE: An agency can have multiple agency managers.If your agency has an agency account created with an agency manager,and you are not a designated agency manager,you need to have your agency manager add you from inside their agency manager account.
To learn more, visit the 
agent vs agency manager functionality
. 
agent vs agency manager functionality
